body:
[P0] The env helper used here returns an identifier string, not a resolved credential. That identifier can end up in the provider config.

This likely wants the helper that returns the resolved value.

Suggestion: use the value-returning env helper in place of the identifier-returning one here.

<details><summary>Prompt To Fix With AI</summary>

`````markdown
This is a comment left during a code review.
Path: src/agents/models-config.providers.ts
Line: 492:495

Comment:
[P0] The env helper used here returns an identifier string, not a resolved credential. That identifier can end up in the provider config.

This likely wants the helper that returns the resolved value.

Suggestion: use the value-returning env helper in place of the identifier-returning one here.

How can I resolve this? If you propose a fix, please make it concise.
`````
</details>
